scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.setup:env: node scripts/load-env.js react frontend && node scripts/load-env.js react admin-dashboard
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.start: npm run setup:env && npm run dev:backend
